description:
Don Mancini, creator of Child’s Play and the ongoing television series Chucky, recently spoke with us regarding the new season and how he’d like to see the brand continue going forward. Additionally, Mancini reveals that he’d love to work on the Orphan franchise – and even suggests a crossover between Esther and Chucky as a [...]

The post Exclusive: ‘Chucky’ Creator Don Mancini Wants An ‘Orphan’ Crossover appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Exclusive: ‘Chucky’ Creator Don Mancini Wants An ‘Orphan’ Crossover

description:
Obviously Disney didn’t always own Marvel. They purchased the comic book company and their other assets, including the Marvel Cinematic Universe, and made it their own. Nevertheless, it looks like a new Marvel comic has seemingly thrown shade at Disney in a new Thor comic book story. The shade was thrown in the #9 issue [...]

The post Marvel Seemingly Throws Shade At Disney In New Story appeared first on ScreenGeek.
title: Marvel Seemingly Throws Shade At Disney In New Story
